portfolio.name: Aircraft Weight and Balance
portfolio.description: A Javascript-based graphical weight and balance calculator for use in General Aviation
features: Calculates an aircraft's Weight and Balance using official values from the aircraft's Pilot Operating Handbook.
The animated graph gives pilots a better feel for how added weight affects the center of gravity.
A pilot can instantly calculate whether the aircraft load is safe with dynamic field validation.
Multiple profiles allow a pilot to quickly switch loads between aircraft if the original reservation falls through.
Runs Unit Tests with NodeJS to ensure correct weight and balance calculations.
I couldn't find anything as powerful for free on the Internet, so I made one myself.

portfolio.name: WUVT Library Search
portfolio.description: Provides a web interface for the database of albums at WUVT, Virginia Tech's campus radio station. DJs may access and richly search over 40,000 albums in WUVT's stacks of CDs and vinyl.
features: Integrates several web APIs for art, track lists, lyrics, curse-words, and more.
Saves valuable information on what DJs search for.
Allows DJs to fulfill song or album requests much more quickly.
DJs can plan their themed shows in advance by richly querying by stack, genre and year fields.

portfolio.name: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: My personal portfolio website. You're here now!
features: Built with modern web technology.
Generates pages from data via Handlebars templates, separating structure from content.
CSS and HTML5 allow graceful layout changes for mobile platforms.

portfolio.name: M:SIS Korra
portfolio.description: Using Log-correlation techniques, Korra discovers the IP Addresses of computers causing Virginia Tech PID account lockouts.
features: Active Directory administrators can easily discover which of a user's multiple smart-devices triggers their account lockouts.
Korra exposes malicious computers, who are otherwise hidden, that trigger users' account lockouts during brute-force scans.
Log correlation techniques greatly reduce an Administrator's effort to search through AD and IIS logs across multiple formats.
Interactive front-end allows administrators and users to richly view their lockout data and history.

portfolio.name: Optimal Satcom: Google Earth Signal Integration
features: I converted existing legacy code (pictured above) to produce open-source GIS formatted plots suitable for Google Earth.
Customers may now view their satellite capacity without the distortion of map projections.

portfolio.name: WUVT Radiothon Pledge System
portfolio.description: A fundraising management system for WUVT Virginia Tech student radio.
features: Replaced an old system of paper forms, where pledge-takers could easily forget to add critical information.
The station Business Manager can easily and paperlessly see and fulfill donations.
Django models and forms allowed <acronym title="Don't Repeat Yourself">DRY</acronym> development, validation and storing of pledge information.
